ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfrlem.1 | |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } |
| 2 | 1 | #P_tfrlem9a | |- ( B e. dom recs ( F ) -> ( recs ( F ) |` B ) e. _V ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( B e. On /\ B e. dom recs ( F ) ) -> ( recs ( F ) |` B ) e. _V ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_tfrlem13 | |- -. recs ( F ) e. _V |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( B e. On /\ ( recs ( F ) |` B ) e. _V ) -> ( recs ( F ) |` B ) e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_resss | |- ( recs ( F ) |` B ) C_ recs ( F ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( dom recs ( F ) C_ B -> ( recs ( F ) |` B ) C_ recs ( F ) ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_tfrlem6 | |- Rel recs ( F ) |
| 9 |  | #P_resdm | |- ( Rel recs ( F ) -> ( recs ( F ) |` dom recs ( F ) ) = recs ( F ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( recs ( F ) |` dom recs ( F ) ) = recs ( F ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ssres2 | |- ( dom recs ( F ) C_ B -> ( recs ( F ) |` dom recs ( F ) ) C_ ( recs ( F ) |` B ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl5eqssr | |- ( dom recs ( F ) C_ B -> recs ( F ) C_ ( recs ( F ) |` B ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 12 | #P_eqssd | |- ( dom recs ( F ) C_ B -> ( recs ( F ) |` B ) = recs ( F ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( dom recs ( F ) C_ B -> ( ( recs ( F ) |` B ) e. _V <-> recs ( F ) e. _V ) ) |
| 15 | 5, 14 | #P_syl5ibcom | |- ( ( B e. On /\ ( recs ( F ) |` B ) e. _V ) -> ( dom recs ( F ) C_ B -> recs ( F ) e. _V ) ) |
| 16 | 4, 15 | #P_mtoi | |- ( ( B e. On /\ ( recs ( F ) |` B ) e. _V ) -> -. dom recs ( F ) C_ B ) |

| 18 |  | #P_eloni | |- ( B e. On -> Ord B ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( B e. On /\ ( recs ( F ) |` B ) e. _V ) -> Ord B ) |
| 20 |  | #P_ordtri1 | |- ( ( Ord dom recs ( F ) /\ Ord B ) -> ( dom recs ( F ) C_ B <-> -. B e. dom recs ( F ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_con2bid | |- ( ( Ord dom recs ( F ) /\ Ord B ) -> ( B e. dom recs ( F ) <-> -. dom recs ( F ) C_ B ) ) |
| 22 | 17, 19, 21 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ( B e. On /\ ( recs ( F ) |` B ) e. _V ) -> ( B e. dom recs ( F ) <-> -. dom recs ( F ) C_ B ) ) |
